attributes.action: support michael oluban in his quest to help inner city youth in birmingham.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: sport/education do work together,we are all aware of the issues concerning ethnic inner city youth in birmingham.there is a bright light shining at aston manor school, the midlands top sporting school.i require personal funding to continue my quest,my goals are disaplin,manners respect,kindness and education.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
